content:
I have an issue with the value sets I use for the extensions I've created for the CIMI Vital Signs IG. On the generated page for the value set there is a statement that says "This value set is not used here; it may be used elsewhere (e.g. specifications and/or implementations that use this content)" This only happens for the value sets bound to the extensions and not ones for backbone elements. I have double checked and all of the value sets are indeed used.
Why is this statement being generated?
Here's an example: http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/cimi-vital-signs/branches/master/ValueSet-AssociatedSituationVS.html
There are several that fall into this category; all of the value sets that are bound to extensions. In this particular case, the extension is used in the Body Weight profile.
the answer is because you have the binding in the wrong place - it belongs on the extension definition itself (Extension.value[x]), not on the extension when you use it
